== Join the community ==
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-cm|Subscribe]]</nowiki> our mailing list
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~kmer/+join|Register and join Ubuntu-cm]]</nowiki> on Launchpad (the group is moderated and will be release after the subscription to the mailing list)
* Write a small summary on you on your Wiki or launchpad page.
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/launchpad_login.php|Register]]</nowiki> and join ou forum (''please to do this after your subscription on Launchpad'')
